name: Find me (itch) (Hannah Pollow)
description:
Falling through different colored objects and you need to find the desired color. A Game Prototype for the "GAME A WEEK" Project-Course, supervised by Csongor Baranyai. 

The Theme of the game is "10 SECONDS." 

Game Description 
1. Falling down, falling down, falling down, my fair lady. 
2. Color catching game (sorry colorblinds :c) 
3. NOT ENOUGH TIME!!! ...right? 

Repository Link: 
https://bitbucket.org/btkgamedesign/project2_hannahpollow_10seconds/

Credits
Idea, Visualisation and Unity Work by Hannah Pollow
Programming Support by Jörg Sroka


University of Applied Sciences Europe 

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Applied Sciences Europe. Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai "Game A Week"  (SummerSemester 2019)
